member.summary: Indicates whether the plugin can run without this dependency.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.Plugins.DependencyAttribute.MinVersion
member.summary: Minimal version of the dependency that can be used. The string should contain the major, minor, [build], and [revision] numbers, split by a period character ('.').

member.name: T:Obsidian.API.Plugins.PluginBase
member.summary: Provides the base class for a plugin.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.PluginBase.Invoke(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Invokes a method in the class. For repeated calls use GetMethod or make a plugin wrapper.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.PluginBase.FriendlyInvokeAsync(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Invokes a method in the class. The actual method can accept less parameters than args. If exception occurs, it is returned inside . This method can be used on non-async methods too.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.PluginBase.InvokeAsync(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Invokes a method in the class. For repeated calls use GetMethod or make a plugin wrapper. This method can be used on non-async methods too.

member.summary: Invokes a method in the class. For repeated calls use GetMethod or make a plugin wrapper.

member.summary: Invokes a method in the class. For repeated calls use GetMethod or make a plugin wrapper. This method can be used on non-async methods too.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.PluginBase.GetMethod``1(System.String,System.Type[])
member.summary: Returns a delegate for this plugin's method.

member.summary: Returns a delegate for this plugin's property setter.

member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for the associated process.

member.summary: Gets the time that the associated process was started.

member.summary: Gets the time that the associated process exited.

member.summary: Gets the number of threads that are running in the associated process.

member.summary: Gets the amount of the virtual memory, in bytes, allocated for the associated process.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.Diagnostics.IProcess.PeakVirtualMemorySize
member.summary: Gets the maximum amount of virtual memory, in bytes, used by the associated process.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.Diagnostics.IProcess.PagedMemorySize
member.summary: Gets the amount of paged memory, in bytes, allocated for the associated process.

member.summary: Gets the amount of nonpaged system memory, in bytes, allocated for the associated process.

member.summary: Gets the amount of pageable system memory, in bytes, allocated for the associated process.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.Diagnostics.IProcess.PeakPagedMemorySize
member.summary: Gets the maximum amount of memory in the virtual memory paging file, in bytes, used by the associated process.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.Diagnostics.IProcess.PrivateMemorySize
member.summary: Gets the amount of private memory, in bytes, allocated for the associated process.

member.summary: Gets the amount of physical memory, in bytes, allocated for the associated process.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.Diagnostics.IProcess.PeakWorkingSet
member.summary: Gets the maximum amount of physical memory, in bytes, used by the associated process.

member.summary: Frees all the resources that are associated with this component.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.Diagnostics.IProcess.Kill
member.summary: Immediately stops the associated process.

member.summary: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance.

member.summary: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance, in milliseconds.

member.summary: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance, in timer ticks.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the timer is running.

member.summary: Starts, or resumes, measuring elapsed time for an interval.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.Diagnostics.IStopwatch.Stop
member.summary: Stops measuring elapsed time for an interval.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.Diagnostics.IStopwatch.Reset
member.summary: Stops time interval measurement and resets the elapsed time to zero.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.Diagnostics.IStopwatch.Restart
member.summary: Stops time interval measurement, resets the elapsed time to zero, and starts measuring elapsed time.

member.name: T:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IDiagnoser
member.summary: Represents a service used for process diagnoses.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IDiagnoser.GetProcess
member.summary: Gets a new component and associates it with the currently active process.
member.returns: A new component associated with the process resource that is running the calling application.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IDiagnoser.GetProcesses
member.summary: Creates a new component for each process resource on the local computer.
member.returns: An array of type that represents all the process resources running on the local computer.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IDiagnoser.StartProcess(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Starts a process resource by specifying the name of an application and a set of command-line arguments, and associates the resource with a new component.
member.param: The application or document to start.
The set of command-line arguments to use when starting the application.
Indicates whether to start the process in a new window.
Indicates whether to use the operating system shell to start the process.
member.returns: A new that is associated with the process resource, or null if no process resource is started.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IDiagnoser.GetStopwatch
member.summary: Returns a new instance of .

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IDiagnoser.StartStopwatch
member.summary: Returns a new instance of and starts it.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileReader.OpenRead(System.String)
member.summary: Opens an existing file for reading.

member.summary: Opens a binary file, reads the contents of the file into a byte array, and then closes the file.

member.summary: Opens a text file, reads all lines of the file, and then closes the file.

member.summary: Asynchronously opens a text file, reads all lines of the file, and then closes the file.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileReader.ReadAllText(System.String)
member.summary: Opens a text file, reads all the text in the file, and then closes the file.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileReader.ReadAllTextAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously opens a text file, reads all the text in the file, and then closes the file.

member.summary: Returns the names of files (including their paths) in the specified directory.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileReader.GetSubdirectories(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the names of subdirectories (including their paths) in the specified directory.

member.name: T:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileWriter
member.summary: Represents a service used for creating and writing to files.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileWriter.OpenWrite(System.String)
member.summary: Opens an existing file or creates a new file for writing.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileWriter.WriteAllBytes(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates a new file, writes the specified byte array to the file, and then closes the file. If the target file already exists, it is overwritten.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileWriter.WriteAllBytesAsync(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously creates a new file, writes the specified byte array to the file, and then closes the file. If the target file already exists, it is overwritten.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileWriter.WriteAllLines(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Creates a new file, write the specified string array to the file, and then closes the file.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileWriter.WriteAllLinesAsync(System.String,System.String[],System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a new file, writes the specified string array to the file by using the specified encoding, and then closes the file.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileWriter.WriteAllText(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new file, writes the specified string to the file, and then closes the file. If the target file already exists, it is overwritten.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileWriter.WriteAllTextAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously creates a new file, writes the specified string to the file, and then closes the file. If the target file already exists, it is overwritten.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileWriter.AppendText(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Opens a file, appends the specified string to the file, and then closes the file. If the file does not exist, this method creates a file, writes the specified string to the file, then closes the file.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileWriter.AppendTextAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously opens a file or creates a file if it does not already exist, appends the specified string to the file, and then closes the file.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileWriter.CreateFile(System.String)
member.summary: Creates or overwrites a file in the specified path.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileWriter.CopyFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Copies an existing file to a new file. Overwriting a file of the same name is allowed.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileWriter.MoveFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Moves a specified file to a new location, providing the option to specify a new file name.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileWriter.DeleteFile(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the specified file.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileWriter.CreateDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Creates all directories and subdirectories in the specified path unless they already exist.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IFileWriter.DeleteDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the specified directory and, if indicated, any subdirectories and files in the directory.

member.name: T:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream
member.summary: Provides a generic view of a sequence of bytes.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.CanRead
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the current stream supports reading.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.CanWrite
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the current stream supports writing.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.Name
member.summary: Gets the absolute path of the data opened in the .

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.Close
member.summary: Closes the current stream and releases any resources (such as sockets and file handles) associated with the current stream. Instead of calling this method, ensure that the stream is properly disposed.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.CopyTo(Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream)
member.summary: Reads the bytes from the current stream and writes them to another stream.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.CopyToAsync(Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads the bytes from the current stream and writes them to another stream.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.Flush
member.summary: Clears buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.FlushAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously clears all buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.ReadByte
member.summary: Reads a byte from the stream and advances the read position one byte.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a block of bytes from the stream and writes the data in a given buffer.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.ReadAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and writes the data in a given buffer.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.ReadLine
member.summary: Reads a line of characters from the current stream and returns the data as a string.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.ReadLineAsync
member.summary: Reads a line of characters asynchronously from the current stream and returns the data as a string.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.ReadToEnd
member.summary: Reads all characters from the current position to the end of the stream.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.ReadToEndAsync
member.summary: Reads all characters from the current position to the end of the stream asynchronously and returns them as one string.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.WriteByte(System.Byte)
member.summary: Writes a byte to the current position in the stream.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes a block of bytes to the stream.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.WriteAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Asynchronously writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream and advances the current position.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.Write(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a string to the stream.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.WriteAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously writes a string to the stream.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.Write(System.Object)
member.summary: Writes the text representation of an object to the stream.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.WriteAsync(System.Object)
member.summary: Asynchronously writes the text representation of an object to the stream.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.WriteLine(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a string to the stream, followed by a line terminator.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.WriteLineAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously writes a string to the stream, followed by a line terminator.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.WriteLine(System.Object)
member.summary: Writes the text representation of an object to the stream, followed by a line terminator.

member.name: M:Obsidian.API.Plugins.Services.IO.IStream.WriteLineAsync(System.Object)
member.summary: Asynchronously writes the text representation of an object to the stream, followed by a line terminator.

member.name: F:Obsidian.API.EClickAction.OpenUrl
member.summary: Opens the given URL in the default web browser. Ignored if the player has opted to disable links in chat; may open a GUI prompting the user if the setting for that is enabled. The link's protocol must be set and must be http or https, for security reasons.

member.name: F:Obsidian.API.EClickAction.CopyToClipboard
member.summary: Copies Value to the clipboard.

member.name: F:Obsidian.API.EClickAction.RunCommand
member.summary: Runs the given command. Not required to be a command - clicking this only causes the client to send the given content as a chat message, so if not prefixed with /, they will say the given text instead. If used in a book GUI, the GUI is closed after clicking

member.name: F:Obsidian.API.EClickAction.SuggestCommand
member.summary: Only usable for messages in chat. Replaces the content of the chat box with the given text - usually a command, but it is not required to be a command (commands should be prefixed with /).

member.name: F:Obsidian.API.EClickAction.ChangePage
member.summary: Only usable within written books. Changes the page of the book to the given page, starting at 1. For instance, "value":1 switches the book to the first page. If the page is less than one or beyond the number of pages in the book, the event is ignored.

member.name: F:Obsidian.API.EHoverAction.ShowText
member.summary: Shows a raw JSON text component.

member.name: F:Obsidian.API.EHoverAction.ShowItem
member.summary: Shows the tooltip of an item as if it was being hovering over it in an inventory.

member.name: F:Obsidian.API.EHoverAction.ShowEntity
member.summary: Shows an entity's name, type, and UUID.

member.name: T:Obsidian.API.SoundCategory
member.summary: https://gist.github.com/konwboj/7c0c380d3923443e9d55

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.IConfig.Motd
member.summary: Server description.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.IConfig.Port
member.summary: The port on which to listen for incoming connection attempts.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.IConfig.Generator
member.summary: Name of the world generator to be used.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.IConfig.Seed
member.summary: Seed supplied to the world generator.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.IConfig.JoinMessage
member.summary: Message, that is sent to the chat when player successfully joins the server.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.IConfig.LeaveMessage
member.summary: Message, that is sent to the chat when player leaves the server.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.IConfig.OnlineMode
member.summary: Whether the server uses MojangAPI for loading skins etc.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.IConfig.MaxPlayers
member.summary: Maximum amount of players that is allowed to be connected at the same time.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.IConfig.MulitplayerDebugMode
member.summary: Whether each login/client gets a random username where multiple connections from the same host will be allowed.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.IConfig.Header
member.summary: Upper text in the in-game TAB menu.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.IConfig.Footer
member.summary: Lower text in the in-game TAB menu.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.IConfig.MaxMissedKeepAlives
member.summary: How many KeepAlive packets can be ignored by the client before disconnecting.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.IConfig.DownloadPlugins
member.summary: Paths of plugins that are loaded at the starttime.

member.name: P:Obsidian.API.IServerStatus.Favicon
member.summary: This is a base64 png image, that has dimensions of 64x64
